name: Joshidaisei Kousai Zukan
overview: A dating and relationship simulation game. Each and every woman has a perfect person. Everyone is different, depending on how they speak and how they were raised. While checking the contents of your wallet, you can eat ice cream, win a prize, go to a hotel, and enjoy a date. You can choose what to say and what to do, and it's easy to operate. Find their hobbies, musical tastes and thoughts on marriage and romance and court them to success!
